#summary Dependencies
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

GData Java Client package depends on several third party libraries.  This page lists all the dependency packages.  

= Dependency Packages =
== Required ==
  * mail.jar in Sun's JavaMail API (version 1.4 or greater).  Sun's JavaMail package available for download from "http://java.sun.com/products/javamail"
  * activation.jar in Sun's JavaBeanActivationFramework.  This is required only if using JDK version 1.5 or less. Sun's JavaBeansActivationFramework is available for download from "http://java.sun.com/products/javabeans/jaf"

== Optional ==
  * servlet.jar in Sun's Servlet API (version 2.3 or greater).  This is required only for code samples 'sample.authsub' and 'sample.gbase.recipe' packages. Sun's Servlet package is available for download from "http://java.sun.com/products/servlet"
